remarks: Lemma for ~ pexmidN .  The contradiction of ~ pexmidlem6N and ~ pexmidlem7N shows that there can be no atom ` p ` that is not in ` X .+ ( ._|_ `` X ) ` , which is therefore the whole atom space. (Contributed by NM, 3-Feb-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pexmidALT.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
pexmidALT.p $e |- .+ = ( +P ` K ) $.
pexmidALT.o $e |- ._|_ = ( _|_P ` K ) $.
pexmidlem8N $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ X C_ A ) /\ ( ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` X ) ) = X /\ X =/= (/) ) ) -> ( X .+ ( ._|_ ` X ) ) = A ) $.
